      • LayoutGrid

        public LayoutGrid(MarklinLayout layout,
                  int size,
                  javax.swing.JPanel parent,
                  java.awt.Container master,
                  boolean popup,
                  TrainControlUI ui)
        This class draws the train layout and ensures that proper event references are set in the model
        Parameters:
        layout - reference to the layout from the model
        size - size of each tile, in pixels
        parent - panel to contain the layout
        master - container with the panel
        popup - is this layout being rendered in a separate window?
        ui -
